content: Is there a way for a non-maintainer to ask bors to try merging again ? I'm asking this for #12118, which was accepted by @Yury G. Kudryashov but couldn't be merged because it no longer compiled with current master (if you're curious, the problem was that you can no longer use finite to mean set.finite even though the set namespace is open). So I merged master and fixed it, but I don't know how to tell bors to try again.
This behavior is a feature, as in lower-trust environments than ours it stops malicious code being slipped in after review
Yes, allowing that would basically mean give write access to everybody.
Anatole Dedecker has marked this topic as resolved.
